sn4.25:14.3: Ekohaṃ → ekāhaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
sn4.25:16.3: Kathaṃ jhāyiṃ → kathaṃ jhāyaṃ (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); kathajjhāyaṃ (mr)
sn4.25:19.1: ragā → rāgā (sya-all); ragā ca (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
sn4.25:24.1: sirasūhacca → sirasi ūhacca (bj); sirasi ohacca (sya-all, km)
